name: MemoryGames
short_description:
A simple game to improve your visual memory.
The game is divided into 4 stages.You can play
each stage separately.
First stage : pairs cards 
The goal is to find all the similar pairs cards.
You have a choice of different type of cards
scientist,sports,artists,geometric shape,miscellaneous ,flags
Second stage : melody cards 
The goal  is to find all the similar musical pairs cards
Third stage :Restore 6
The goal is to restore six pictures in right order.
At the beginning a panel with six images are shown
for 20 seconds and then hidden.
A panel containing some pictures is displayed.
You have 30 seconds to restore the six images.
Fourth stage: find 4
The goal is to retrieve the locations of four pictures
 among eight.
At the beginning a panel with eight images are shown
for 20 seconds and then hidden.
4 images are displayed.
You have 30 seconds to place the 4 images into the suitable boxes.
summary: Improve your visual memory by playing
